Gladly | San Francisco, CA | Fulltime onsite only

Software Engineer | $125-175k

We've had a lot of great folks find us from this post on HN, and we're still hiring for the following roles: devops/platform engineer, engineers with security expertise and voip experts.

- We have a modern tech stack (React/Node/GoLang/Docker) and product architecture (real-time pubsub microservices)

- We're super early (~25 people), but well-funded with an experienced founding team of B2B serial entrepreneurs

- We have an environment of mutual respect, mentorship and learning from peers

I'm an engineer at Gladly (FKA Sagan) and enjoying it a lot! Feel free to email me with questions (alice@gladly.com), or check out http://gladly.com/#hiring
